name: Qantas Business Credit Card
description: With one of the lowest annual fees in the market, and a range of insurances, the Qantas Business Credit Card will help your points soar. You will also receive up to 55 days interest free on purchases.

features.additionalValue: With Bendigo Bank you can turn your phone or smart watch into your wallet.

features.additionalInfo: Complimentary membership to Qantas Business Rewards - usually $89.50. Save 20% on Qantas Club memberships for you and your employees
features.additionalValue: Using your Qantas Business Credit Card can earn you 0.6 Qantas Points on eligible domestic and international transactions, capped at 30,000 per statement period. Plus earn an additional 1 Qantas Point per $1 spent on selected Qantas products and services. 0.3 Qantas Points per dollar spent on eligible government transactions

features.additionalInfo: Cover is activated when you purchase the full value of the covered item with your card
On stolen or accidentally damaged purchases when the total cost is charged to your credit card

Purchase the total value of your return domestic travel ticket (and your spouse’s and dependants’ if they’re travelling with you) on your card. You may have cover if your interstate flight is delayed, your luggage is lost or you’ve had to cancel your trip due to illness, injury or death of a relative. Terms, conditions, limits apply.
Unauthorised Transaction Insurance is available for the duration of the period that the accountholder’s Bendigo Qantas Business Credit Card is current and valid

eligibility.additionalInfo: Additional cardholders must be 16 years of age

fees.name: Periodical payment to other financial institution
Replacement Card Fee - Standard Post (default) Free
fees.additionalInfo: Replacement, reissue or redirection fees: Domestic Express Post $15.00, Domestic Toll Courier $15.00, International Registered Post $15.00, International Courier $60.00

fees.name: Emergency Replacement Cards
fees.additionalInfo: The fee applies to the emergency replacement of a card lost or stolen overseas, within 72 hours of request
